channel.title: Jerry Seinfeld on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Jerry Seinfeld on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jerry Seinfeld Compares “Free Palestine” Movement to the KKK
item.description: The comedian said the pro-Palestine movement is less “honest” than the white supremacist group: “I’m actually thinking the Klan is a little better.”

item.title: Why Stand-up Legend George Wallace Can’t Get Off the Stage After 49 Years in Comedy: “I’m Living My Dream”
item.description: The star of Prime Video’s ‘Clean Slate’ is in Montreal to receive a lifetime achievement award at the Just For Laughs festival.
